name: SSF14
title: Site-Specific Factor 14
subtitle: HER2: Result of Other or Unknown Test
notes:
**Note 1:** If another type of in situ hybridization test was performed for Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 (HER2), other than fluorescent (FISH) or chromogenic (CISH), record the results here.

**Note 2:**  If it is unknown which type of HER2 test was performed, record the results here.

**Note 3:**  If no unnamed HER2 test is mentioned in the medical record, code to 999 unless there are circumstances under which the test isn't performed, for example, no histologic specimen.
rows: Negative/normal; within normal limits; not amplified
Borderline; equivocal; indeterminate; undetermined whether positive or negative
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
Test ordered, results not in chart
Test not done (test not ordered and not performed)

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
